short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension for effortless posting of TripAdvisor replies on Extranet platform.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Introducing our AI-Powered TripAdvisor Reply Assistant Chrome extension: Generate smart, AI-driven replies directly from your extranet to enhance guest satisfaction and streamline review management. Improve your property's online reputation with efficient, personalized responses.
